titleStmt.title: A sermon preach't at a publick ordination in a country congregation, on Acts XIII. 2, 3. Together with an exhortation to the minister and people, / by another brother.
titleStmt.author: Offley, William, 1659 or 60-1724.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for John Lawrance, at the Angel in the Poultry.,

notesStmt.note: Item at reel position 876:22 identified as Wing S2630 (entry cancelled).
Reproductions of original in Henry E. Huntington Library.
